headline: JPM upgrades Freeport-McMoRan on upside from tariff and supply tightness
summary: Investing.com -- JP Morgan upgraded Freeport-McMoRan (NYSE:FCX) to Overweight from Neutral, citing upside potential from possible US copper tariffs and long-term supply challenges. The firm raised its price target to $52, implying a ~30% upside.

headline: Freeport-McMoRan Stock: How A Short Strangle Can Bring A Big Premium
summary: Freeport-McMoRan stock displays high implied volatility. Option traders can take advantage of that by selling what is known as a "short strangle."

headline: Freeport-McMoRan Stock Gets an Upgrade. Why It’s a Tariffs Winner.
summary: The threat of tariffs has spooked the market but there will still be winners from President Donald Trump’s trade policies.

headline: Freeport-McMoRan - Undervalued: Copper With A Gold Kicker
summary: Freeport McMoRan (FCX) is a BUY as copper and gold prices surge. Despite recent setbacks, the stock offers untapped potential. Read more here.
